name: Hunt Fiery Dragons: Fight & Kill Down Fire Dragon
name_original: Hunt Fiery Dragons: Fight & Kill Down Fire Dragon
description:
You dream about dragons fights, you imagine about dragon hunting, having your own dragon trophies to be proud of, here is your chance to fulfill your dreams, to make real your imaginations.
This hunting game gives you the chance to face & hunt down the dragons that scare you in your dreams. Whether is it is fire breathing monster dragon, flying dragons, dragons kings, dragons bugs dragon lizards. All are here in this fascinating fantasy mountainous land. You have your best sniper shooting gun, the gun that gives you the best fighting and hunting chances against dragons.
It is the fight , It is the hunting challenge you must win, It is the only way to survive against these monster dragons. It is the best way to shoot them before they come and burn you alive in fire. Aim and shoot them at distance to avoid their wrath of fire.
Their wrath that scares the every one around the world. With fascinating mountainous dragons land, This game gives your the unique experience of Sniper shooting and Dragon face off. Killing combination of action and fantasy.

Game Story
With your hunting sniper gun, you have traveled to a land, that has fascinating mountains but also deadly dragons. Now it is battle of survival , Hunt them down or be hunted. Lets see who survives. Who is hunted.
Top Game Features
- Fascinating mountainous 3D Land
- variety of dragons & levels to play
- Best sniper shooting experience
- Keep eye on health, you have limited power
- Hit then on head to kill quickly
- kill and keep rising levels

How to Play
- Swipe left center of screen to move the aim
- tap zoom button to set the aim at target
- tab shoot button to hunt them down.
- keep eye on health of yours and of your enemy.
